summary: Keep only reads whose length is within a certain range

arguments.summary: Keep only reads with length at most equal to the specified value
arguments.name: --max-read-length

arguments.summary: Keep only reads with length at least equal to the specified value
arguments.name: --min-read-length

description: Keep only reads whose length is ≥ min value and ≤ max value.
name: ReadLengthReadFilter
